page.title: 20MEDIA
page.content:
{Local News In Winsford. A fish and chip shop in Woodford Lane was the scene of a fire which caused Â£10,000 of damage.Customers had to run out into the street when the frying range caught fire.An assistant tried to fight the fire with a fire extinguisher but the fire brigade had to be called out. The shop will open when the insurance company pay the damages. { { ************* } This data has been collected and compiled by.
Elaine Berry and Marie Moyes and the Pupils of Mount Pleasant Junior School Winsford. John Higginson and the pupils of Whitegate C of E Aided School Whitegate.
